content: Banner Saga 2 is, hands-down, among the most-engrossing and well-written storylines I've seen in a tactical battle game. The art direction is beautiful and consistent, the voice acting is sparely applied yet perfectly timed, and the world building is nothing short of absolute: click on a place-name on the map, even one where your journey will never take you, and you get a full history of that place, oftentimes woth extra gossip and bits of local legend. EVERY decision has an impact on the story flow, just as every decision will impact the battles as well: allocate your 'Renown' (the game's currency) to buy food for your clan, or use it to level-up a combat character? Purchasing an artifact that will turn a warrior into just the tank your party needs can backfire when, two scenes later, he leaves because you havent fed your people. Simply outstanding design, development, and delivery! Hats off to Versus Evil!
replyContent: Thank you for the beautiful review, Justin. The team at Stoic really appreciates reading reviews like this one, so I've shared it with the rest of the staff on your behalf. We hope you'll enjoy Banner Saga 3, coming out this summer! üö©
